page.title: 17RECREATION -youth club
page.content: The youth club meets every Friday from 7pm to 10pm and has 70 registered members who produce an average attendance 20 rising to 50 with visitors on disco nights. Most members are in the age range 12 to 18 years; the age limit is 21. Membership costs 50p a year and admission is 10p for members and 20p for non-members, rising to 20p and 50p on disco nights. The club building opposite the village hall is in a poor state and the club is threatened with closure. A new management committee is presently trying to raise money to cover repairs. Recent visits have included ice-skating in Bournemouth and the Calshot Activity Centre. The youth club offers young people a worthwhile alternative to spending Friday night watching TV.
